name: Azur Project
description:
This was a game I made for my school project.

Heavily inspired in Touhou, this is a simple shoot 'em up idea with two level.

The story works something like this. The world is called Azur, and strange things are happening, like magical things are showing up and strange objects are moving arround the landscape. The games starts with our protagonist, Zuru, getting curious and moving to investigate this incident.
